title: What is the Quotient Property?
text: If a is a real number and $$m$$ and $$n$$ are integers, then: $$\frac{a^m}{a^n}=a^{m-n}$$
speech: If a is a real number and  m  and  n  are integers, then:  fraction, a to the m-th, over, a to the n-th,  is equal to, a raised to the m minus n power
pacedSpeech: If a is a real number and   m
are integers, then:   fraction, a to the m-th, over, a to the n-th,  is equal to, a raised to the m minus n power

title: Simplifying the Expression
speech: b raised to the 8 minus 12 power  becomes , b raised to the parentheses negative 4  power
